title: Medior Software Engineer (Backend/Integrations/.NET)
description: Backend developer role focused on owning the Exchange Connector and Outlook integration. Maintain and improve the Exchange Connector, write and improve automated tests, optimize performance and threading. Sustainable software, ownership, and trust in a privacy-first company building secure Microsoft-Nextcloud integrations. Requires professional C# / .NET experience, 2-4 years software engineering, production code maintenance, automated testing, Git.

title: .NET Software Engineer
description: Join a team of 10-15 developers designing and optimizing software solutions for the energy market. Translate strategic objectives into intelligent information systems and integrations. Requires Bachelor's CS, 5+ years experience, strong .NET C# knowledge, TypeScript/JavaScript, SQL, Azure, Microsoft Power Platform. Benefits: 28 vacation days, unlimited training budget, flexible work.

title: (Senior) Software Engineer .NET/C#
description: Develop and optimize software solutions for the energy market. Work with 10-15 developers translating strategic goals into smart information systems. Requires Bachelor's CS, 5+ years, strong .NET C#, TypeScript, JavaScript, SQL, Azure, Microsoft Power Platform. Integration monitoring, root cause analysis, performance optimization.

title: Lead Software Engineer
description: Shape the technical direction of a Cloud SaaS team as technical architect ensuring platform performance, security, maintainability. Guide backend/frontend modernization, mentor engineers. Tech stack: .NET-based services, Azure integrations, Vue-based frontend. Requires strong backend and cloud architecture background, Azure experience.

title: Software Engineer
description: Software Engineer with backend development experience for BIM model exploration platform. Build tools that allow architects, engineers, and builders to explore BIM models without installing heavy desktop software. Skills: .NET, Azure, cloud architecture.

title: C# Developer Eindhoven Region for High Tech Companies

Requires Bachelor's/Master's in Software Engineering, 2+ years High Tech sector, proficient in C#.NET, SCRUM, CI/CD, Azure, OOP, UML. Benefits: competitive pension, travel reimbursement, 25 holidays.

title: Junior Software Engineer (Python) - Smart Vehicles & Robotics
description: Develop Python software for intelligent autonomous vehicles that make independent decisions, communicate with environment, and interact with hardware. Requires basic Python experience (internship/project OK), familiarity with Django/Flask/FastAPI, basic knowledge of databases and APIs. Interest in hardware/embedded/robotics. Bachelor's/Master's in CS.

description: Develop workflow automation features in agile multi-site software team environment. Software development and automation in a collaborative setting.
